ServMiddle.heading: What You Get?
ServMiddle.desc: We offer a complete visual identity for your business — a professional logo in all formats, colors, and typography, a website with an admin panel and team instructions. We provide print-ready files for business cards and letterheads, as well as ready-made templates for social media and presentations, ensuring a polished and consistent presence both online and offline.

ServBottom.heading: ИТ консултации
ServBottom.p1: Предоставянето на консултантски и технически услуги е насочено към цялостна подкрепа на бизнес процесите на нашите клиенти, чрез прилагане на доказани практики, съвременни технологии и персонализирани решения. Нашият екип от експерти осигурява стратегическо планиране, техническа експертиза и оперативна гъвкавост с цел.
ServBottom.p2: Всяка услуга се адаптира според конкретните нужди на клиента, като осигуряваме условия за дългосрочно партньорство, основано на доверие, прозрачност и професионализъм.

ServDetails1.heading: Web Design and Development
ServDetails1.1: We create modern, functional, and fast websites that work for your business.
ServDetails1.2: We combine creative design with a solid technical foundation to build sites that not only look impressive but also attract customers.
ServDetails1.3: Our adaptive solutions are compatible with all devices, with a focus on speed, security, and user convenience.
ServDetails1.4: Each project is crafted with attention to detail — from the first sketch to final implementation and ongoing support.

ServDetails2.heading: Graphic Design and Branding
ServDetails2.1: We create a visual identity that sets your business apart and speaks the language of your clients.
ServDetails2.2: From logo and typography to a complete brand style, we build a vision that conveys confidence and recognizability.
ServDetails2.3: Our process includes research, concept development, design, and finalization of a full brand package: logo, color palette, icons, templates, and corporate materials.
ServDetails2.4: Our goal is simple — to turn your idea into a memorable and consistent brand that works both online and offline.

ServDetails3.heading: Corporate Websites and Online Stores
ServDetails3.1: Your website is the face of your business online.
ServDetails3.2: We create corporate websites and online stores that reflect your identity and inspire trust.
ServDetails3.3: We develop systems with easy navigation, flexible content, and integrations for payments, catalogs, and orders.
ServDetails3.4: Our team plans everything — from structure and design to SEO optimization and training on the admin panel.
ServDetails3.5: The result is a professional website that sells, informs, and builds a strong online presence.

ServDetails4.heading: Social Media
ServDetails4.1: A presence on social media is essential for any modern business.
ServDetails4.2: We develop a comprehensive strategy for content, visuals, and communication tailored to your audience.
ServDetails4.3: We create templates for posts, ads, and stories that make it easier for your team and maintain a consistent visual style.
ServDetails4.4: We help you build an active and engaged community that turns followers into customers.

ServDetails5.heading: Marketing Materials
ServDetails5.1: Your communication starts with the details — business cards, brochures, catalogs, letterheads, and presentations.
ServDetails5.2: We create marketing materials that present your business with professionalism and style.
ServDetails5.3: Each design follows your brand identity, ensuring your messages are clear, consistent, and impactful.
ServDetails5.4: We provide files ready for print or digital use, helping you maintain a consistent and modern image for your clients.
